name: Akiri
description: Akiri is a pretty Satin-mix female. She is a bit shy when she is in her cage, but should come out of her shell once she is in a forever home. She is easy to handle and loves being petted. Akiri may work well as a bondmate. She would do best with older children and adults. Akiri is spayed and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Allison
description: Allison is a beautiful Palomino rabbit with a heart full of love to give. Sadly, she lost her previous owner, but she’s ready to find a new family who will cherish her as much as she deserves. With her soft golden coat and gentle personality, Allison is sure to brighten any home. Allison would do well in a home where she receives plenty of attention and affection. She thrives in a peaceful environment where she can relax and feel safe. She would be a great fit for individuals or families who are looking for a gentle and loving rabbit to spoil with love. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please come and meet this sweet bunny.

name: Angeline
description: Angeline is a gorgeous English Spot mix with distinctive markings and a charming personality. She is an active and inquisitive bunny who loves to explore her surroundings. Whether she’s hopping around to check out new spaces or relaxing in a cozy spot, Angeline is always full of curiosity.Angeline would thrive in a home that allows her plenty of room to roam and play. She would do well with an adopter who understands active rabbits and can provide her with enrichment and stimulation. A patient and loving home will help her build confidence and bring out her affectionate side. She is litterbox trained and may work well as a bondmate. Please consider making her a part of your family.

name: Arabella
description: Arabella is an adorable young Lionhead mix bunny who was surrendered to the rescue just weeks after being purchased from a pet store. Though her start in life was a bit bumpy, Arabella has a sweet nature and is now looking for a forever family who will give her all the love and stability she deserves. Being a baby bunny, she’s full of curiosity and ready to explore a world where she can truly feel at home. She is easy to handle but like most young bunnies, she does not like being held. She is spayed and litterbox trained. She would do best with teens and adults. Arabella may work well as abondmate. Please come and meet this energetic girl.

name: Asperatus
description: Asperatus is a friendly, sweet rabbit looking for her forever home. With her gentle nature and affectionate personality, she loves interacting with people and is ready to be a loyal companion. Whether she’s hopping around, exploring, or getting cozy for pets, Asperatus is a joy to have around. She’s well-socialized and eager to find a family that will provide her with the love and attention she deserves.Born at the rescue to her mother Cloud 9, she’s now ready to find her forever home. Asperatus would thrive in a home where she can receive plenty of attention and love. She would be happy in a family setting or with an individual who is looking for a sweet, easygoing companion. A spacious pen or a free-roam setup would be ideal for her to explore and hop around. She is litterbox-trained and ready for her forever home.

name: Bella Rosa
description: Bella Rosa is a beautiful 4-year-old Rex rabbit who was returned to the shelter through no fault of her own. Despite her past, she is a sweet, gentle soul looking for a loving forever home. Bella Rosa has a calm, affectionate nature and enjoys human companionship. She may also be a great fit as a bondmate for another rabbit, given her friendly disposition.Bella Rosa would thrive in a calm, loving home where she can receive the attention and care she deserves. She would be happy as a solo bunny or with a rabbit friend, provided the bonding process is done with patience and care. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please give her a second chance at a happy ending.

name: Bennett
description: Bennett is a charming 4-year-old Lionhead rabbit with a soft, fluffy mane and an easygoing personality. This little gentleman was recently surrendered when his family welcomed a new baby. He would love a home where he can get all the attention he deserves. He would do best with teens and adults. He loves being petted but does not enjoy being held for long periods. Bennett may work well as a bondmate.Bennett is a calm, affectionate bunny who’s wonderfully litterbox trained, making him easy to keep clean and tidy. He’s sociable and enjoys being around people but also appreciates his quiet time to relax and take in his surroundings. Bennett’s easygoing nature makes him a great companion for someone looking for a loving but independent pet. Please come and meet this sweet boy.

name: Blackjack
description: Blackjack is a handsome Mini Rex mix with a soft, velvety coat and a gentle soul. He was found outside but is now safe and searching for a loving forever home. While he can be shy at first, he has a sweet nature and enjoys quiet companionship. With patience and kindness, Blackjack will blossom into a wonderful companion.Blackjack would thrive in a calm and patient home where he can adjust at his own pace. He would do best with an adopter who understands shy rabbits and can provide a peaceful environment. A quiet household without loud noises or young children would be ideal for helping him feel secure. He is litter box trained and neutered. Please give this sweet bunny the forever home he deserves.

name: Brenda
description: Brenda is a sweet and gentle Lionhead bunny with a touch of shyness that adds to her charm. While she may be initially reserved, she has a heart full of love to share with the right family. Brenda is looking for a patient and understanding home where she can blossom into the affectionate companion she's meant to be. Due to her quiet nature, she would do best with adults and teens. Brenda may work well as a bondmate. She enjoys quiet and calm interactions and would thrive in a peaceful environment. Brenda is easy to handle but prefers to sit next to her humans rather than on their lap for now. She is spayed and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet girl, she would love to be a part of your family.

name: Brodie
description: Brodie is a small, sweet Mini Rex with the softest fur you’ll ever touch. He has a gentle nature and enjoys quiet companionship, making him a wonderful companion for the right home. However, he prefers a calm environment and would do best in a home with teens and adults where he can feel safe and secure.Brodie would do best with individuals who understand his need for a stress-free environment. Brodie has a lot of personality for someone so small. He is litterbox trained, neutered and ready for his forever home.

name: Buttercup
description: Buttercup is a sweet, gentle soul with a soft orange and white coat and a bright personality. Found outdoors, Buttercup was a brave little adventurer, but now she’s looking for a safe, loving home where she can settle down for good. With her friendly nature and litterbox skills, she’s ready to become your perfect companion.Buttercup is incredibly friendly and easy to handle, making her a great fit for families, couples, or solo adopters who want a calm, lovable bunny. She loves getting attention from her humans, is comfortable being held, and enjoys gentle pets, making her easy to bond with and a joy to have around. She is litterbox trained, spayed, and ready for her forever home.

name: Cassidy
description: Meet Cassidy! She is a fun-loving Mini-Lop mix who would love to be a part of your family. Her ears appear to have a mind of their own and rarely point in the same direction from one minute to the next. She may do well as a bondmate. She would do well in a home with adults and children. Cassidy loves to explore and would love to have lots of room to run. She will definitely require some decent bunny-proofing since she is very curious. She is easy to handle and does quite well with her litterbox habits. Cassidy is ready to bring joy and charm into your life. If you believe you can offer Cassidy the love and care she deserves, please get in touch to inquire about adopting her.

name: Charlaine
description: Charlaine is a sweet-natured Polish mix female. She enjoys attention and is willing to sit on someone's lap for pets. She may work well as a bondmate. Charlaine can be a bit shy when meeting new people but she should warm up once she is in a forever home. She is spayed and litterbox trained. Please consider becoming her forever family.

name: Cloud 9 and Cirrus
description: Cloud 9 and Cirrus are a mother and daughter bonded pair. They are sweet and come with a built-in best friend. Both girls are litterbox trained and spayed. They would love to have room to run and explore. The girls would do well with older children and adults. They are ready for their forever home!

name: Coby
description: Coby is a sweet and gentle Lionhead/Lop mix who is ready to find a loving forever home. He was surrendered to the rescue when a child lost interest in caring for him, but despite this, Coby has kept his affectionate and easygoing nature. He’s a calm bunny who enjoys spending time with people and is easy to handle, making him a great companion for families or individuals looking for a loving pet.Coby would be happiest in a home with a calm, loving environment. He would do well in a family setting with older children or adults who can respect his boundaries and give him the attention he craves. A quiet household where he can feel comfortable and relaxed will help Coby flourish. He is litterbox-trained and ready for his forever home.

name: Confetti
description: Confetti is a female English Spot/ Dutch mix rabbit. This sweet girl was found abandoned in a box outside a store, but despite her rough start, she hasn’t lost her friendly and loving nature.Confetti is spayed, easy to handle, and always happy to receive gentle pets. She would make a wonderful companion for a family or individual looking for a social and affectionate bunny. With a safe and loving home, Confetti will bring you so much joy. Confetti would do well with older children and adults. She is litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Cordie
description: Cordie is a beautiful Himalayan mix rabbit with striking markings and a friendly, outgoing personality. She enjoys human interaction and is always happy to greet her favorite people. Whether she's exploring her surroundings or settling in for some gentle pets, Cordie is a loving and social companion looking for a forever home.Cordie would thrive in a home where she gets plenty of companionship and enrichment. She would do well with first-time rabbit owners or experienced adopters alike. A home with space to explore and play will make her happiest. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Cruz
description: Meet Cruz, a friendly English Spot mix bunny. Cruz is a delightful and curious rabbit with a playful spirit. He's full of energy and loves to explore his surroundings. Despite his initial outdoor adventures(he was found loose), Cruz adapted well to indoor living and is eager to find a forever home where he can thrive. Cruz would do best in a loving home where he can receive the attention and care he deserves. He's an indoor rabbit now and should be kept in a clean, safe, and spacious enclosure with room to hop and play. A family or individual who can spend time with him, give him plenty of love and provide a healthy diet and stimulating toys would be ideal for Cruz. He is neutered and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet boy.

name: Currant
description: Meet Currant, a stunning Silver Marten rabbit with a sleek, shiny coat and boundless amounts of energy! This lively little lady is always on the move, ready to explore, jump, and zoom around her space. If you're looking for an active and playful bunny to keep you entertained, Currant might just be the perfect match!Currant would thrive in a home that can provide her with lots of space to exercise. She would do best with an experienced rabbit owner who understands her need for activity and enrichment. A home with a large play area or free-roaming opportunities would be ideal. She may work well as a bondmate for your bunny. She is litterbox trained, spayed and ready for her forever home.

name: Dante
description: Dante is a strikingly handsome Mini-Rex/Satin mix rabbit, with a unique and beautiful coat. His charming looks are just one of the many reasons to consider him as your new furry friend. Dante has a shy side, and he can be a bit timid at first. But beneath that initial reserve, you'll discover a gentle and loving soul who yearns for affection and trust. Once you earn Dante's trust, you'll find that he is easy to handle and enjoys being close to his human companions. A bunny this handsome should have no trouble finding a bondmate who loves him back. Do you think your bunny would be interested in meeting Dante? He would do well with teens and adults. He is a very neat gentleman and does well with his litterbox habits. He's a loving rabbit who will blossom in a patient and understanding home. Dante is the perfect companion for someone who appreciates the beauty of a rabbit's journey from timid to affectionate. If you're willing to provide him with a calm and stable home, he will reward you with unwavering love and loyalty.

name: Declan
description: Declan is a friendly and easy-to-handle rabbit. He enjoys human interaction and will gladly accept your affection as he loves humans. Declan is a bundle of energy and loves playtime. Declan's love for playing with his cardboard box provides endless entertainment for both him and his family. Watching him explore and interact with his favorite toy is sure to put a smile on your face. Declan is litterbox-trained and neutered. His new family will need to make sure to keep his mane free of mats and to keep his lop ears clean. He would do well with children and adults and may work well as a bondmate. By bringing Declan into your life, you'll not only enjoy his playful antics but also experience the love and companionship of a truly special rabbit. Don't miss the opportunity to make Declan a cherished member of your household!

name: Denise
description: Denise was born at the shelter. She is friendly and likes to explore. She is easy to handle and would love to have room to run. She would do best with older children and adults. Denise is spayed and litterbox trained. She is ready for her forever home.

name: Egg Nogg
description: Egg Nog is a sweet and playful English Spot mix with a big personality! As the baby of Sugar Plum, he’s inherited her friendly nature and love for companionship. He enjoys exploring, playing with toys, and getting gentle pets from his favorite people. However, Egg Nog requires a special diet to keep his GI health in check. With proper care, he’s a happy, energetic bunny who loves life!Egg Nog would thrive in a home that can provide him with the right nutrition and attentive care to keep him healthy. He’s friendly and social, making him a great fit for someone looking for an engaging and loving rabbit companion. He is litterbox trained and neutered. Egg Nog may work well as a bondmate for your bunny. Please consider making him a part of your family.

name: Elantra
description: Elantra is a shy but sweet mixed breed rabbit. She is easy to handle but does not like being held. She would do best with an experienced rabbit owner due to her shy nature. She would love to have room to run and explore. She might work well as a bondmate, it may even help bring her out of her shell. Elantra is spayed and litterbox trained. She is a very good bunny, please give her a chance at having a forever home.

name: Ellis
description: Ellis is a striking magpie-colored rabbit who was found outside but is now safe and ready for a loving forever home. While he can be shy at first, he is gentle and easy to handle, making him a wonderful companion for a patient and understanding adopter. With time, love, and a calm environment, Ellis will surely grow more confident and comfortable.Ellis would do best in a calm and patient home where he can feel safe and build trust. He would thrive with an adopter who understands shy rabbits and is willing to give him the time he needs to adjust. A quiet household without loud noises or sudden movements would be ideal for helping him feel secure. He is litterbox trained and neutered. Ellis may work well as a bondmate for a female bunny. Please make an appointment to come and meet this sweet boy.

name: Eureka
description: Eureka is a large, outgoing white rabbit who is always ready to explore and meet new people. Found loose, Eureka has made a smooth transition to indoor life and is now looking for a forever home where he can continue to thrive. He has a big personality to match his big size and will make a wonderful companion for someone looking for an active, friendly bunny.Eureka would do best in a home where he has plenty of space to roam and explore. A family or individual who can provide him with lots of attention, love, and room to move around would be perfect for him. He would thrive in a household that can offer daily interaction, playtime, and a safe, comfortable environment. Eureka would do well in a home with older children or adults. He is litterbox-trained and ready for his forever home.

name: Faith
description: Faith is a female Satin-mix rabbit. She had a litter and they have found families, but not mom. She can be a bit shy and may work well as a bondmate. She loves being pet and should open up once she is in a home where she can run and jump. She is spayed and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Farah
description: Farah is a gentle and shy rabbit who is still learning to trust humans. She spent much of her early life outside with little to no interaction, but she is slowly discovering the comforts of indoor life. While she may be reserved at first, she is easy to handle and appreciates gentle pets and quiet companionship. She prefers not to be held for long periods but will happily accept attention on her own terms.Farah would thrive in a calm, patient home that will allow her to build confidence at her own speed. She would do best with an adopter who understands shy rabbits and is willing to give her the time and space she needs to feel secure. She may work well as a bondmate for your bunny. Farah is litterbox trained and spayed. Please give this sweet girl a chance at a real forever home.

name: Felipe
description: Felipe is a handsome Lionhead rabbit with a soft, fluffy mane and a quiet, gentle personality. He is naturally shy and takes time to warm up to new people and surroundings, but with patience and kindness, he will slowly build trust and form a deep bond with his adopter. He may be reserved, but his sweet nature shines through once he feels safe.Felipe would do best in a calm home where he can feel secure. A quiet household with older children or adults who respect his boundaries would be ideal. He may work well as a bondmate for your bunny. Felipe is neutered, litterbox trained, and ready for his forever home.

name: Figgy Pudding
description: Figgy Pudding is a sweet and special bunny with a heart as warm as her name! This affectionate girl is looking for a compassionate, understanding family who can provide her with the love and care she deserves. Figgy has some medical needs, so she requires a bit more attention, but she makes up for it with endless love and loyalty. She requires a strict diet as she has some GI issues, but mainly needs second-cut hay and no sweets.Figgy Pudding is as gentle as they come. She loves quiet moments with her humans and will happily settle in for a cozy petting session. Her calm, loving nature makes her a wonderful companion for anyone who wants a sweet and soothing presence in their life. She is litterbox trained and ready for her forever home.

name: Fiver and Frisco
description: Fiver(black) and Frisco are a bonded pair of adorable Lionhead rabbits. These two are gentle souls who can be a little shy at first, but with patience and love, they warm up beautifully. They were found outside with their siblings, mother, and father. They are easy to handle and find comfort in each other, often snuggling together or exploring their space side by side. Their fluffy manes and sweet, curious personalities make them a joy to watch and care for.Fiver and Frisco will thrive in a quiet, patient home that understands shy bunnies need time to build trust. They would do best in a calm environment where they can settle in at their own pace. Since they are a bonded pair, they must be adopted together. These brothers are litterbox trained. neutered and ready for their forever home.

name: Flurry
description: Flurry is a beautiful, gentle New Zealand rabbit with a calm and easy-going nature. She’s a breeze to handle and enjoys spending time with people, making her a wonderful companion for the right family. With her soft fur and sweet personality, Flurry is ready to find a forever home where she’ll be loved and cared for.Flurry would do best in a home with older children or adults who can handle her gently and respectfully. She would thrive in a calm environment where she can feel safe and secure. Whether in a spacious pen or as a free-roam house rabbit, Flurry will be a loving and affectionate companion. She may work well as a bondmate. She is litterbox trained, spayed and ready for her forever home.

name: Freddie
description: Freddy is a charming and friendly Lionhead mix rabbit who loves attention and interaction. His soft mane and sweet personality make him an irresistible companion. He’s easy to handle and enjoys being around people, making him a great choice for first-time and experienced rabbit owners. Freddy enjoys human interaction and will happily come over for pets. His mane will require regular brushing and grooming to keep it free of mats.Freddy would thrive in a home where he gets plenty of companionship and space to explore. He would do well in a family setting, with older children or adults who can give him the love and attention he craves. He is litterbox trained and neutered. Please give this fluffy boy a forever home.

name: Glenna and Gayla
description: Meet Glenna and Gayla, a cute bonded pair of Satin mix rabbits. Glenna and Gayla are a bit reserved, but once you gain their trust, they are easy to handle and have a lot to offer. Having a bonded pair means they come with a built-in best friend. Their antics will keep you entertained for hours and they do love to explore together. A bunny-proofed home is a must for this pair. They would do well with older children and adults. Both girls are clean and they do well with their litterbox habits. These lovely girls are waiting for a family that will cherish their bond and shower them with the love and care they deserve.

name: Hopkins
description: Hopkins is a friendly Satin mix male rabbit. He loves being petted and is easy to handle. He does not like being held for long periods of time. Hopkins may work well as a bondmate. He would do best with older children and adults. Hopkins is litterbox trained and neutered. Please give him a chance for a forever home.

name: Ink and Black Feather
description: Ink and Black Feather are a beautiful bonded pair of Lionhead sisters looking for a quiet and patient forever home. These two are shy, but their bond with each other gives them comfort and confidence. With time, love, and a calm environment, they will slowly come out of their shells and learn to trust their new family.Ink and Black Feather would thrive in a calm, low-stress home with an adopter who understands shy rabbits. They need a family that will give them time to adjust and feel safe. A home without young children or loud environments would be best for these sensitive girls. They have a lot of love to give to the right people. Both girls are litterbox trained and spayed. Please give them a chance at a forever home.

name: Isaiah and Isaac
description: Isaiah and Isaac are a sweet pair of Mini-lop mixed males. They are very outgoing and love to be petted. These poor boys were found in a box left outside to fend for themselves. They love to explore and their antics will keep you entertained. Isaiah and Isaac would do well with children and adults. They are litterbox trained and neutered. Please come and meet this cute pair.

name: Jet Stream and Asperatus
description: Jet Stream(black and white) and Asperatus are a bonded pair of sisters who were born at the shelter to Cloud 9. They are easy to handle but prefer to not be held for long periods of time. They are on the large side of medium and will need lots of room to run and play. They would do best with older children and adults. Both girls are spayed and litterbox trained. Please give them a forever home.

name: Juliana
description: Juliana is a sweet and gentle Chinchilla mix rabbit with a calm and loving nature. She was found after being left outside, and despite her rough start, she has shown her resilient spirit. Juliana previously gave birth to a litter of babies and now, she’s ready to find her forever home where she can relax, enjoy attention, and receive all the love she deserves.Juliana would thrive in a home where she can receive plenty of love and attention. She would do well in a family setting or with individuals who can provide her with a peaceful environment and plenty of space to run and play daily. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please give this friendly girl a chance at a forever home.

name: Kazoo
description: Kazoo is a sweet and gentle English Spot mix who has overcome a tough start in life. Left outside on his own, Kazoo is now ready to find a loving home where he can feel safe and appreciated. Despite his past, he’s an easy-to-handle bunny with a calm and affectionate personality. Kazoo is looking for a family who will offer him a caring, stable environment where he can thrive and enjoy life to the fullest.Kazoo would do well in a home where he can receive plenty of attention and affection. He’s a good fit for families with older children, individuals, or couples who are patient and gentle. Kazoo would love a home with enough space for him to explore and hop around. He is litterbox-trained and ready for his forever home.

name: Lamar and Luther
type: Florida White / Mini Rex / Mixed (short coat)
description: Lamar and Luther are a bonded pair of Mini-Rex/Florida White mixed brothers. They were born to Lisa at the rescue. These boys are a bit shy when meeting new people and may take some time to come out of their shells. They are neutered and litterbox trained. Please consider making them a part of your family.

name: Lamont
type: Florida White / Mini Rex / Mixed (short coat)
description: Lamont is a Florida White/ Mini-rex mix who was born at the shelter to Lisa.  He is easy to handle but prefers to not be held for long periods of time. He may work well as a bondmate. He loves being petted and would do well with adults and older children. He is neutered and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet boy.

name: Lawson
description: Lawson is a handsome Chinchilla mix rabbit with a soft, silvery coat and a gentle nature. While he tends to be reserved at first, he is incredibly sweet and easy to handle. With a little patience and love, Lawson will happily settle into his forever home and become a wonderful companion. Lawson would do best in a calm and peaceful home where he can feel safe and comfortable. He would thrive with an adopter who understands that he may take a little time to adjust but will reward patience with affection. A home with adults or older children who respect his space would be ideal. Lawson may work well as a bondmate. He is litterbox-trained, neutered, and ready for adoption.

name: Lia
description: Lia is from Lisa's first litter of babies. She is easy to handle but prefers to not be held for long periods of time. She would do best with teens and adults due to her shy nature. She would love to have room to roam and explore. She is litterbox trained and spayed. She is ready for a forever home, please come and meet Her.

name: Lilibeth
description: Lilibeth is a stunning, big white bunny with a heart as beautiful as her looks. She is a curious and sweet-natured rabbit who enjoys exploring her surroundings and interacting with people. Her gentle personality makes her easy to handle, and she would love a home where she can receive plenty of attention and affection.Lilibeth would thrive in a home where she has space to explore and a loving adopter who will appreciate her gentle, inquisitive nature. She would do well as a solo rabbit or could potentially bond with another calm and friendly bunny. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please give this friendly girl a chance at a forever home.

name: Maize
description: Maize was returned to our rescue with her bondmate Mayflower after several years. Due to the stress of being returned, their bond broke. Both of these girls deserve to be in a loving home again, especially if they could still see one another and be adopted together. They were returned through no fault of their own. Despite being returned, they have very loving dispositions and deserve to spend their senior years in a home with a loving family. Maize loves being petted and is easy to handle. She would love to have room to run and play. She is spayed and litterbox trained. She would do well with older children and adults. Please give these girls a chance at a forever home again.

name: Marbles
description: Marbles is a handsome Chinchilla rabbit with a beautiful, soft coat and a gentle heart. Sadly, he was left behind when his previous family got new dogs, but he hasn’t let that get him down. Marbles is friendly and affectionate, with a calm disposition that makes him easy to handle and a joy to be around. He’s ready for a fresh start with a family who will truly cherish him! Marbles would do best in a loving home that can give him plenty of attention, stability, and gentle handling. He’s adaptable and would fit well into a calm household, either as a single pet or with another friendly rabbit. Marbles deserves a family who can provide a safe, secure space and appreciate the love he has to give. He is neutered and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet boy.

name: Marcie
description: Marcie is a beautiful Lionhead rabbit with a soft coat, a little mane and a gentle heart. She can be a bit shy when first meeting new people, but she’s easy to handle and warms up with patience and kindness. Once she feels comfortable, Marcie enjoys quiet companionship and gentle pets. She would do best in a home with older children and adults. Marcie may work well as a bondmate for a male bunny. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Marvin
description: Marvin is a sweet and curious English Spot mix who is always eager to explore his surroundings. His friendly and easygoing nature makes him a joy to be around, and he enjoys interacting with people. Whether he’s investigating a new toy or hopping up for some gentle pets, Marvin is a wonderful companion who would make a great addition to a loving home.Marvin would thrive in a home where he has space to explore. His adaptable and social personality makes him a great choice for both first-time and experienced rabbit owners. He is easy to handle and enjoys being held for short periods of time. He may work well as a bondmate. He is neutered and litterbox trained. Please give this sweet boy a chance at a forever home.

name: Mary Kay
description: Mary Kay is a unique and outgoing Lionhead rabbit, quite larger than most of her breed. She was discovered as a stray and brought to our rescue, where she's been winning hearts with her vibrant personality. She may work well as a bondmate if your bunny is looking for a friend. Mary Kay is a big girl, and she needs space to stretch her legs and explore. She's an active rabbit who would thrive in an environment that allows her to move freely and express her natural curiosity. She is easy to handle and does well with being held. She would do great in a home with kids and adults. She is litterbox trained and spayed. If you're ready to welcome a big-hearted Lionhead rabbit with an outgoing personality into your life, Mary Kay is waiting for you. She's a bundle of joy and energy, and her presence will light up your days. With your love and care, Mary Kay will become an unforgettable member of your family.

name: Mayflower
description: Mayflower was returned to our rescue with her bondmate Maize after several years. Due to the stress of being returned, their bond broke. Both of these girls deserve to be in a loving home again, especially if they could still see one another and be adopted together even if they cannot share a cage anymore. They were returned through no fault of their own. Despite being returned, they have very loving dispositions and deserve to spend their senior years in a home with a loving family. Mayflower loves being petted and is easy to handle. She would love to have room to run and play. She is spayed and litterbox trained. She would do well with older children and adults. Please give these girls a chance at a forever home again.

name: McGhee
description: McGhee is a handsome Dutch rabbit with a sweet and gentle personality. He enjoys spending time with people and is comfortable being held, making him a great companion for a loving home. However, he prefers a calm environment, as sudden movements can startle him. With a patient and gentle approach, McGhee will be a wonderful addition to the right family.McGhee would do best in a home with older children or adults who understand his need for a peaceful environment. He would thrive in a setting where he can feel safe and comfortable while still receiving plenty of love and attention. McGhee may work well as a bondmate. He is litterbox-trained and ready for his forever home.

name: Meesha
description: Meesha may be small in size, but he has a big personality! As a Polish rabbit, he is compact, curious, and full of charm. His petite frame makes him an ideal companion for someone looking for a little bunny with a lot of character. Meesha is ready to find a loving home where he can be adored. Meesha would do well in a home where he has space to play and explore. He would thrive with an adopter who understands small but spirited rabbits and can provide him with enrichment to keep him engaged. A quiet household with older children or adults would be a great match for him. He may work well as a bondmate for your bunny. He is litter box trained and neutered.

name: Meteo
description: Meteo is an English Spot bunny with a personality that's as intriguing as his distinctive coat. He's a sweet and curious rabbit who loves to explore his surroundings and interact with his human friends. While he may not enjoy being held, his gentle nature and playful disposition make him a delightful companion. He would do well with older children and adults in his new family. Meteo is neutered and does well with his litterbox habits. Meteo is ready to become a part of your life, bringing his unique personality and playful attitude to your home. By adopting this sweet English Spot bunny, you'll be gaining a wonderful companion who's as unique as he is endearing. Don't miss the opportunity to welcome Meteo into your heart!

name: Midnight Sky
description: Midnight Sky is a beautiful Mini Rex mix with the softest, velvety fur. She was found outside and, though a little shy at first, she quickly warms up and shows her sweet, friendly personality. With a bit of patience and love, Midnight Sky comes out of her shell and enjoys gentle pets and quiet companionship. Her calm and gentle nature makes her a peaceful, loving presence. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Minnesota and Vermont
description: Meet Minnesota and Vermont, an adorable bonded pair of Lionlop rabbits who are as sweet as they are cute! Vermont is the handsome gray male with a calm and loving nature, while Minnesota is the sweet spotted female with a playful spirit. These two are inseparable and need to stay together forever. They are easy to handle, gentle, and enjoy the companionship of each other and their humans.Minnesota and Vermont would thrive in a home where they can receive plenty of attention and love. They would do best in a household with a calm atmosphere where they can relax and enjoy each other’s company. They can be a wonderful addition to a family that can provide a secure space for them to roam and explore. They are litterbox trained and ready for their forever home.

name: Nadia and Tatiana
description: Nadia(black) and Tatiana are a pair of Dutch mix girls. They are easy to handle and love being pet. They would love to have a home with room to run around. They would do well with older children and adults. Both girls are spayed and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this cute pair.

name: Nibbles
description: Nibbles is a stunning New Zealand black rabbit with a playful spirit and a friendly personality. She’s an active bunny who loves to explore, hop around, and engage with her surroundings. Whether she’s zooming around during playtime or seeking attention from her humans, Nibbles is always ready for some fun!Nibbles would thrive in a home where she has plenty of space to move and explore. She would do well with an adopter who can provide enrichment, playtime, and lots of love. Whether free-roaming or in a spacious enclosure, she needs room to stretch her legs and express her energetic nature. Nibbles is litterbox trained and spayed. Please consider making her a part of your family.

name: Nico
description: Nico is a sweet Dutch/Netherland Dwarf mix rabbit. He was found outside and was very skinny when he came into the rescue. He has gained weight and is quite a healthy boy now. He loves getting head pets and is easy to hold and handle. He would do best with teens and adults due to his small size. Nico may work well as a bondmate. He is litterbox trained and neutered. Please come and visit with him to see if he would be a good fit for your family.

name: Nigel
description: Meet Nigel, a friendly Chinchilla rabbit. Nigel's boundless curiosity makes him an engaging companion. He enjoys exploring his surroundings and will keep you entertained with his inquisitive nature. He thrives on human interaction and will gladly accept your affection in the form of pets. He likes sitting next to people on the couch. He may eventually become a lap bunny once he trusts his new family. His sweet disposition makes him a true joy to be around. Nigel does very well with his litterbox habits and he is neutered. He may work well as a bondmate. He would love to have lots of room to run and explore. Nigel would do well with adults and children. Please come and meet this sweet boy.

name: Norma Jean and Skitter
description: Norma Jean and Skitter may be an unlikely duo with their size difference, but their bond is unbreakable! This sweet pair is looking for a loving home where they can stay together forever. Norma Jean, the striking large Magpie bunny, is calm and gentle, while Skitter, the small Holland Lop, brings a touch of liveliness to the pair. They balance each other out perfectly and love spending their days together. Norma can be a bit more reserved with new people while Skitter loves everyone he meets. They need space to move around comfortably and a family that will appreciate their unique bond. A calm environment with gentle interaction will help them feel safe and happy. A home with adults and teens would benefit both bunnies. They are litterbox trained and waiting for their forever home.

name: Paula
description: Paula is a shy but sweet Chinchilla mix rabbit. She enjoys being petted and is easy to handle, but does not like being held for long periods of time. Since she is a bit shy, she would do best with adults and teens. She may work well as a bondmate. Paula is spayed and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this cute girl.

name: Petra
description: Petra is a charming and lively Lionhead rabbit with a heart full of love to give. Sadly, she was returned after her previous owner lost interest, but she hasn’t let that dull her bright personality! Petra is outgoing, friendly, and always eager to interact with people. She enjoys exploring, receiving gentle pets, and being the center of attention. With her fluffy mane and curious nature, she’s sure to bring joy to her forever family.Petra would thrive in a home that appreciates her playful and social nature. She loves spending time with people and would enjoy a space where she can explore and interact with her family. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Petra may work well as a bondmate. She’s perfect for someone looking for an engaging and affectionate rabbit companion.

name: Poppy and Willa
description: Meet Poppy(grey) and Willa, an adorable bonded pair of Mini Rex rabbits looking for their forever home together! With their velvety-soft fur and sweet personalities, these two are twice the love and twice the fun. They are inseparable and rely on each other for comfort and companionship.Poppy and Willa would thrive in a calm and loving home where they can be with each other. The girls' antics will keep everyone entertained as they love to explore together. They are both easy to handle and enjoy being petted by people. They are spayed and litterbox trained. They would do best with older children and adults. Please come and meet this sweet pair.

name: Rochelle
description: Rochelle is a curious Satin mix female. She would love room to run and explore. Rochelle may work well as a bondmate. She would do well with adults and children. Rochelle is easy to handle but prefers to not be held for long periods of time. She is spayed and litterbox trained. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Rosalee
description: Rosalee is a beautiful Lionhead rabbit who was found outside, but despite her rough start, she remains sweet and trusting. She’s an affectionate bunny who enjoys gentle attention and is easy to handle, making her a wonderful companion for a loving home. She will require: a spacious enclosure or free-roam setup where she can hop and explore, regular grooming for her Lionhead mane, and lots of daily attention. Rosalee would do well in a home where she can receive plenty of love and attention. She’s an excellent fit for families with older children who can handle her gently. A calm and caring environment will help her continue to feel safe and secure. She is litterbox-trained and ready for her forever home.

name: Rosita
description: Rosita is a lively and affectionate Florida White/New Zealand mix who is ready to find her forever home! She is full of energy and loves to explore, run, and play. Despite her active nature, she is also easy to handle and enjoys spending time with people. Whether she’s zooming around during playtime or settling in for some pets, Rosita is a wonderful companion.Rosita would do best in a home that can provide her with plenty of space to move and explore. She would thrive with an adopter who enjoys an energetic bunny and can offer enrichment, toys, and daily playtime. A family that appreciates her lively personality will be the perfect match! She is litterbox-trained and ready for a forever home.

name: Saunders
description: Saunders is a handsome Lionhead rabbit. He would do well in a home with adults and older children. He could be a great match for individuals or families who are looking for a gentle and affectionate pet that will bring joy and companionship to their lives. Saunders is neutered and uses his litterbox well. He may work well with a bondmate if you are searching for a pair of rabbits. He likes being held for short periods of time and might become a lap bunny once he gets to trust his new people. Please keep him in mind as you look for a bunny, like black dogs, black bunnies are less likely to be adopted.

name: Simone
description: Simone is a beautiful English Spot mix with a gentle and affectionate nature. She is a sweet rabbit who enjoys spending time with people and is easy to handle, making her a wonderful companion for any loving home. Whether she’s hopping around exploring or settling in for some pets, Simone is always a delight to be around.Simone would do well in a home where she receives plenty of love and attention. She would thrive with an adopter who enjoys interacting with their bunny and providing enrichment. Her friendly and adaptable nature makes her a great fit for first-time rabbit owners or experienced adopters alike. She is litterbox trained, spayed, and ready for her forever home.

name: Snowdrop and Thistle
description: Snowdrop and Thistle are a lively and inseparable pair of sister bunnies who are always on the move! These two are full of energy, love to zoom around, and enjoy playtime together. Whether they are exploring their surroundings, hopping to new heights, or binkying with excitement, they are sure to bring joy and entertainment to their forever home.Snowdrop and Thistle would thrive in a home with plenty of space to run, jump, and play. They need an adopter who understands active rabbits and will provide them with enrichment and fun activities to keep them engaged. A home with room to explore and rabbit-safe toys will keep these two happy and entertained. They are spayed, litterbox trained and ready for their forever home.

name: Sprite
description: Sprite is a handsome 2-year-old Californian rabbit with a curious spirit and a heart full of adventure! He was found under a bridge, but he’s ready to leave his past behind and hop into a loving forever home.This bright-eyed boy is litterbox-trained, easy to handle, and always eager to explore his surroundings. Whether investigating new spaces or looking for a treat, Sprite’s curiosity makes him a fun and engaging companion.If you’re looking for a friendly, intelligent bunny to bring joy to your home, Sprite might be the perfect match! Could you be the one to give him the fresh start he deserves? He is neutered and ready to meet everyone.

name: Stiles
description: Stiles is a loving, sweet 5-year-old rabbit who is looking for his forever home. Despite his age, he’s still full of personality and enjoys spending time with his humans. Stiles has a calm and affectionate nature, making him a wonderful companion for someone looking for a loving bunny. He’s also a great candidate to be paired with another rabbit.Stiles would do best in a home where he can receive plenty of love and attention. He would thrive in a household with either individuals or families with older children who understand how to interact gently with rabbits. He’ll need a spacious living area where he can roam and explore, along with a quiet, safe environment to relax in. He is litterbox-trained and ready for his forever home.

name: Stratus
description: Stratus is a special bunny who has a unique story to tell. She was born at our rescue to her mom, Cloud 9, and she's been growing into a beautiful and charming rabbit ever since. Stratus would love a home that understands her need for space and exercise. A rabbit-proofed area where she can run, binky, and play to her heart's content would make her truly happy. Additionally, patience and a gentle approach will help her come out of her shell. She would love a home with adults and/or older children. She may work well as a bondmate. Stratus does quite well with her litterbox habits and is spayed. If you're ready to open your heart to a shy but incredibly sweet rabbit, Stratus is waiting for you. She's a unique and beautiful bunny who is just waiting to find her forever family. With your love and care, Stratus will become an unforgettable part of your life.

name: Sugar Plum
description: Sugar Plum is a beautiful English Spot rabbit with a playful and affectionate personality. She was found outside but has quickly adjusted to indoor life, showing just how resilient and loving she is. She’s friendly, curious, and comfortable around both dogs and cats, making her a great addition to a multi-pet household. Sugar Plum enjoys exploring her surroundings, lounging in cozy spots, and getting gentle pets from her favorite humans.This social girl would do best in a home with plenty of space to explore and interact with her family. She may work well as a bondmate. She’d love a home that will give her time to roam and plenty of attention. Sugar Plum would be a great match for a family with respectful pets or someone looking for an outgoing bunny companion. Sugar Plum is litterbox trained, spayed, and ready for her forever home.

name: Suni
description: Suni is a sweet and affectionate Florida White mix rabbit looking for a loving forever home. With her bright personality and gentle nature, she makes a wonderful companion. Suni loves attention and enjoys spending time with her humans, whether it's receiving gentle pets or relaxing nearby.Suni would do well in a home where she can receive lots of love and attention. She would thrive with an adopter who enjoys spending time with their bunny and giving her the affection she deserves. She’s a great fit for first-time rabbit owners or families looking for a loving and friendly companion. Suni may work well as a bondmate for your bunny. She is litterbox trained and spayed. Please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Sylvie and Quill
description: Sylvie and Quill are an inseparable pair of Lionhead rabbits looking for a forever home together. Sylvie, with her beautiful fluffy mane, is the more confident of the two, while Quill, who lacks a mane, is a bit more reserved but just as loving. They are both on the shy side and may take a while to open up to new people. These two complement each other perfectly, offering a mix of curiosity, companionship, and adorable bunny antics!Sylvie and Quill would thrive in a calm home where they can continue to grow in confidence and receive lots of love. They need a patient adopter who will respect their personalities and give them the time and space to feel secure. They are altered and litterbox trained. Please give them a chance at a forever home.

name: Troy
description: Troy is a very friendly and outgoing Chinchilla mix rabbit. He loves attention and runs to his cage door to greet people. He is neutered and litterbox trained. He may work well as a bondmate. He would do well with a family that could let him run for hours each day and spend time interacting with him. Troy does well with older children and adults. He is easy to handle and hold. Please come and meet this fun boy.

name: Wednesday
description: Wednesday is a large, active girl with a big personality and a love for adventure! She’s full of energy and needs plenty of space to hop around and explore. This sweet, easy-to-handle bunny is looking for a home where she can get the exercise and attention she deserves. Whether she’s racing around or snuggling up for some pets, Wednesday is ready to bring fun and excitement to her forever home.Wednesday would thrive in a home with plenty of room for her to stretch her legs and explore. A spacious pen or free-roam setup would be ideal. She would do well in an active household where she can get plenty of playtime and attention. She is litterbox trained and spayed, please come and meet this sweet girl.

name: Xander and Millie
description: Xander and Millie are the perfect pair—sweet, friendly, and always together! Xander, with his sleek black Satin coat, is calm and affectionate, while Millie, the fluffy Lionhead, brings a touch of playful charm. These two complement each other beautifully and love to snuggle, explore, and enjoy gentle attention from their humans. They are both easy to handle and would make wonderful companions for a loving home.This bonded pair would do best in a home where they can stay together forever. They enjoy human interaction and would thrive in an environment where they would get plenty of space to explore, toys to keep them entertained, and lots of love.  They are litterbox trained and Millie's coat will require brushing often to keep it free of mats. Whether you’re new to rabbits or an experienced bunny owner, Xander and Millie will be a wonderful addition to your family.
